channel.title: [FM] Quantum Mafia - Game Thread - Mafia Victory
channel.description:
## I will keep mechanics explanations in the signups topic, as that's bit of a lot to copy:
https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fm-quantum-mafia-signups-17-17/85869/1
## Players: 1. ~~Leafia~~ --> KyoDaz 2. ~~EliThePsycho~~ --> [color] **Town Voyeur** [/color] - Hugged day 4 3. an_gorta_pratai 4. ~~Simon~~ --> - [color] **Vanilla Town** [/color] - Dead Night 2 5. ~~Marluxion~~ --> [color] **Vanilla Town** [/color] - Hugged day 5 6. Shurian 7. ~~Wazza~~ --> ~~SirDerpsAlot~~ --> - [color] **Vanilla Town** [/color] - Dead Night 3 8. ~~Magnus~~ --> - [color] **Town Cop** [/color] - Dead Night 1 9. ~~SirDerpsAlot~~ --> [color] **Town Roleblocker** [/color] - Hugged day 2 10. ChopChop 11. ~~Jane~~ --> - [color] **Vanilla Town** [/color] - Dead Night 4 12. YouButWorse 13. ~~PokemonKidRyan~~ - [color=red] **Mafia Goon** [/color] - Hugged day 3 14. Zone_Q11 15. ~~Rome~~ --> ~~SirDerpsAlot~~ --> - [color] **Vanilla Town** [/color] - Dead Night 5 16. LiLi041 17. WindwardAway
---
## Setup:
![image|690x437, 75%](upload://7an9AZelguJIshrAJfGYcOB7QwU.png)
---
## Game information
**Game Host:** @eevee **Shire has been lynched:** @eevee_bot **Quantum Physics Nerd and Co-Host:** @Icibalus **Oh god, we need more reviewers!** - Arete, Chloe, DatBird, Sulit, Geyde
**Days** - 48 hours long **Nights** - 20 hours long **Time for host to process all the superpositions of night actions** - 4 hours long
Total - 48 / 20 / 4
**Number of games randed:** 6000
**Wincons:** [color=green]**Town**[/color] wins when all threats to town have been eliminated. [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] wins when they achieve parity, regardless of alive PRs.
**Hugs:** 1. No hugging is enabled. Vote for "**/no hug**" to forgo a hug for given day. 2. Tied votes will result in no elimination. 3. Majority is **NOT** in effect.
Also, please follow the [Global Forum Rules ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244) as well as the [FM/FoL Rules ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926)
---
## Action processing order: 1. Maf Kill 2. Maf RC 3. Maf RC 4. Cop 5. MDet 6. Voyeur 7. Maf Kill 8. E Vig 9. Doc
